description: This file defines an AuthController class for handling user authentication endpoints such as registration and login, using JWT tokens in a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: Controller exposing authentication API endpoints for registration and login.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Handles user registration; creates a new user and returns a JWT token.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates user credentials and returns a JWT token if successful.
